title: News24 | Trump claims TikTok deal a ‘formality,’ China asks for fair business rules
summary: US President Donald Trump hailed on Friday a call with Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping, claiming a deal to sell blockbuster app TikTok could be a “formality” and saying he would visit China, which gave a more cautious assessment of their talks.

title: News24 | Hong Kong evacuates 6 000 residents after discovery of ‘fully functional’ WWII bomb
summary: Hong Kong planned to evacuate thousands of residents on Friday as a bomb left over from World War II was discovered at a construction site.

title: News24 | Israel orders mass evacuation of Gaza City, warns of ‘unprecedented force’
summary: The Israeli military warned on Friday it would operate with “unprecedented force” in Gaza City, telling residents to flee southwards as it presses its ground offensive on the territory’s largest urban centre.

title: News24 | AES turns two: Unity or unequal partnership?
summary: Two years on, the Alliance of Sahel States (AES) faces criticism over unmet goals, uneven benefits, and unfulfilled economic promises for Mali, Niger and Burkina Faso. So how far has the bloc come?

title: News24 | ‘Beyond McCarthyism’: Fierce US debate on freedom of speech following Charlie Kirk killing
summary: For Americans, the words are practically sacred: the First Amendment to the US Constitution guarantees freedom of speech.
